predicate.note: Frames file for 'invade' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry.

example.name: often with purpose clause
example.text: She has been on the move almost incessantly since last Thursday, when an army of adjusters, employed by major insurers, invaded the San Francisco area to help policyholders sift through the rubble and restore some order to their lives *trace*.
example.arg: an army of adjusters, employed by major insurers,
to help policyholders sift through the rubble and restore some order to their lives
